facebook.summary:
LONDON, March 24, 2016 /PRNewswire/ --

US Neurology, the peer-reviewed journal, has published a review on the diagnostic differentiation of multifocal motor neuropathy versus entrapment neuropathy.

news.title: Deflazacort in Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
news.summary: /PRNewswire/ -- US Neurology, the peer-reviewed journal, has published an article summarizing the benefits and risks of deflazacort in Duchenne muscular dystrophy.
